name: DoodleDude 1
description: This game is a platformer where you will discover a hidden gen many scientists have been trying to find for years, the gravity gem, this gem can switch up gravity. One day, you were trolling around to dig for treasure, but then you go to a cave which leads you to the gravity gem, since your dumb, u break it and now u have the power of gravity, the FBI finds u flying and is tryna kill u
